items.label: 🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
items.href: /about/Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
items.docId: Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper

company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.title: Adapt to change 🏕️
company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.description: Be bold, get things done, take responsibility. Get hands dirty, take small steps, be prepared, survive, speed, autonomy, freedom

company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.title: Ethical heart 🌳
company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.description: Care about sentient organisms. Go beyond product to have sustainable ecosystem and environment. Balance work and life

company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.title: Gather value 🍯
company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.description: Bring value, create symbiotic relations, enrich all parties. We bring value to beekeepers and to our team. Grow wider in your abilities and knowledge to bring more impact.

company/Culture and values 🫀/index.title: Culture and values 🫀
company/Culture and values 🫀/index.description: Cultural values affects how we do things internally, which clients and employees align with us

company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.title: New horizons 🏔️
company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.description: Reach mastery and wisdom. Improve continuously, grow above yourself, define new norm, withstand the test of time, quality, performance. Reach equilibrium of opposing values, opinions and responsibilities.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.title: Observable mind 🧿
company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.description: Value rationalism, science, innovation that has built the modern civilisation. Cultivate creative and critical thinking, data-driven decisions and experimentation

company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.title: Radiate truth 🌞
company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.description: Be joyful and honest, have fun. Our code and processes are transparent to the world. Communicate to reduce boundaries, complexity, be predictable to be trusted.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.title: Team effort 🐝
company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.description: Be part of the collective, make friends, communicate, lead by example, equal voice, take ownership, disagree and commit

company/equity.title: Equity & fundraising program plan 🦚
company/equity.description: 💡 This page is summarizing the rough plan of the equity program for the employees, founders, investors and advisors.

company/index.title: 👔 Company
company/index.description: 💡 A matrix-structure organization organizes its work into verticals and horizontal layers. A vertical is a business and product-oriented full stack view on the system as a subset of layers. A horizontal layer is an implementation, usually a specialised, technological mean and thus a - view on the system.

company/Meeting recordings.title: All-hands meeting recordings 🎥
company/Meeting recordings.description: Following Radiate truth 🌞 values, we are transparent in internal communications, which is important in modern asynchroneous world. Thats why we record important meetings.

company/volunteer.title: Volunteering ❤️‍🔥
company/volunteer.description: You can contribute by following these steps:

index.title: Overview
index.description: Gratheon is a garage-phase bootstrapping startup with big dreams. See 📑 deck for quick overview.

Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.title: ❄️ Overwintering collapse
Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.description: Bees can die over the winter if they are too weak as they cannot warm themselves and its brood

Problems/🌲 Distant locations.title: 🌲 Distant locations
Problems/🌲 Distant locations.description: If your apiaries are far away (forest, rural area), you need to drive for inspections.

Problems/🌻 Insufficient pollination.title: 🌻 Insufficient pollination
Problems/🌻 Insufficient pollination.description: Food security - 735.1M undernourished people worldwide according to FAO in 2022

Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.id: Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.title: 🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new b.description: Beekeeping is a vast knowledge area that is hard to gain at the beginning without proper education, keep up to date of.

Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.title: 🏘️ Multiple apiaries
Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.description: Related to 💪🏻 Unscalable work, problem is that with growth of the colony numbers, beekeepers need to place bees closer and more even across the land to avoid 🌻 Insufficient pollination

Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.title: 🐭 Mice killing a colony
Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.description: In summer a hive of 50,000 to 60,000 bees can defend itself against intruders like mice. In winter population is reduced to 20,000 bees. Too cold to fly out and defend. The mice urinate and deficate on frames and destroy the wax foundations.

Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & colo.title: 🐻 Bears destroying hives & colonies
Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & colo.description: Bears attack colonies and they cannot recover after that.

Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colony.title: 👁️ Observability of bee colony
Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colony.description: Hard to make decisions without up-to-date and correct information about the colony development. Decisions can be about splitting the hive, treating against varroa mites, closing the hive entrance for defence, adding a new queen, adding or removing frames with brood or honey/polle

Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing bees.title: 💀 Alcohol washing killing bees
Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing bees.description: Alcohol-washing bees to detect varroa mites kills 100-300 bees just to have observability

Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.title: 💀 Intrusive inspections
Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.description: - Squashing of bees when hive sections and frames are moved and placed on top of each other

Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.title: 💢 Aggressive bee colonies
Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.description: Hard to inspect, can get stings through the suit

Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.title: 💢 Hornet attacks
Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.description: Hornets (Vespa) can wipe out beehive colony

Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.title: 💪🏻 Physical labor
Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.description: Lifting hive sections with honey, especially being in a suit while its hot outside

Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.title: 💪🏻 Unscalable work
Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.description: Linear scaling of physical work as you add more hives and as they grow in height

Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.title: 📦 Warehouse organization
Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.description: Beekeepers need to maintain various warehouse management tasks and organize their equipment

Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.title: 🗃️ Flimsy beehives
Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.description: Weather can have detrimental effect on the colony survival.

Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.title: 🗃️ Poor hive ventilation
Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.description: Some beehives have poor ventilation. Bees during winter die because of this ❄️ Overwintering collapse

Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.title: 🗃️ Ugly beehives
Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.description: - Bricks on roof against the wind

Problems/🦀 Infestations.title: 🦀 Infestations
Problems/🦀 Infestations.description: Hive infestations weaken colonies, lead to viral infections, cause deformed wings, uncapped pupae

Problems/🧶 Swarming.title: 🧶 Swarming
Problems/🧶 Swarming.description: Swarming is natural and good. This is how bee colony reproduces.

Problems/index.title: 🌨️ Problems
Problems/index.description: 💡 Hard, frequent, unscalable work to keep bees healthy for precise pollination and food security

purpose/Ethics.title: Ethics ☯️
purpose/Ethics.description: Ethics is a branch of philosophy that deals with the study of what is morally right or wrong, good or bad.

purpose/index.title: 🌻 Purpose
purpose/index.description: Automating beekeeping 🐝 with AI vision and robots 🤖

purpose/Naming.title: Naming
purpose/Naming.description: Company name has multiple meanings on different layers, so there is no definitive answer

purpose/Symbolism.title: Symbolism
purpose/Symbolism.description: Colors represent main wavelengths that 🐝 bees can see, company values and other associations:

Target clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekeepe.title: 👨🏻 Potential new beekeepers
Target clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekeepe.description: - Someone like Backyard beekeepers or Farmers who wants to take care of bees but is afraid and lacks information

Target clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers.title: 👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers
Target clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers.description: - Tech enthusiasts willing to tinker with software and hardware

Target clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers.title: 👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers
Target clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers.description: House owner (B2C, not a legal entity)

Target clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeeper.title: 👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeepers
Target clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeeper.description: - Pollination services for farmers ~90% of income

Target clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up companie.title: 👩🏻 Tech scale-up companies
Target clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up companie.description: - High tech companies For example organizations such as LHV, TalTech, Pipedrive do have bees on rooftops

Target clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.title: 👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers
Target clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.description: An extension of Backyard beekeepers, but in city area where main concern is ability to inspect bees without too much swarming hassle affecting neighbours

Target clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.title: 🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers
Target clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.description: - Main motivation - improving yields Insufficient pollination
